name: DISTRAINT 2 - OST
detailed_description:
Composed by Jesse Makkonen, the DISTRAINT 2 OST features beautifully haunting and just plain weird and playful original songs.

DISTRAINT 2 OST is available in FLAC and MP3 320 kbps formats!

Tracklist:

01 - Menu
02 - Previously in DISTRAINT
03 - Somewhere Beyond
04 - Where It All Began
05 - Save
06 - Fear's Creature
07 - Greed
08 - Delusion
09 - Hope's Domain - Part One
10 - The Old Couple
11 - Mom
12 - Comfort
13 - We Play Cards
14 - Hope's Domain - Part Two
15 - Childhood
16 - Cafe
17 - Loss
18 - Hope's Domain - Part Three
19 - Inspiration
20 - Forgiveness
21 - McDade, Bruton & Moore
22 - I'm Sorry
23 - Run
24 - We Are Here For You
25 - Blink of an Eye
26 - The End
27 - Release Trailer
28 - Hidden Bosses

short_description: Composed by Jesse Makkonen, the DISTRAINT 2 OST features beautifully haunting and just plain weird and playful original songs.
supported_languages: English, French, Finnish, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian, Turkish, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB card capable of shader 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9c Compliant
